Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_trrgy0dk&referenceId=tag:reuters.com,2021:newsml_OVF7QLX3Z_K15&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: At least 100 people were feared dead in Kentucky after a swarm of tornadoes tore a 200-mile path through the U.S. Midwest and South, demolishing homes, levelling businesses and setting off a scramble to find survivors beneath the rubble, officials said Saturday. Gloria Tso reports.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rX3lo8
